attributes.additional_details:
Devon youth services are to receive funding cuts in the year 2014.
This will have a impact on services being offered to young people between the ages of 13-21 with possible youth center closures and funding being cut to other youth organisations such as careers and advice also resulting in young people not having a safe place to go.
As young people will have no where to go as these cuts are in place vulnerable young people who don't have supportive relationships which may result turning to crime as they don't have the advice or guidance .
